Description: Indicates that the flight is scheduled by the carrier.
Aircraft has left the departing gate. Also known as: Chocks off
Aircraft has taken off. Also known as: Wheels Up, Airborne
Aircraft has landed. Also known as: Wheels Down, Touchdown
Aircraft now at arriving gate. Also known as: Chocks on
Flight has been diverted. Note that this status can happen anytime after OutGate and before InGate.
Indicates a General Aviation flight is proposed for the route.
